themes: Desire for funding with fewer bureaucratic barriers
Concerns about excessive process impeding progress
Acknowledgement of good intentions behind bureaucracy
key_phrases: Fund them while limiting as much government-enforced bureaucracy as possible
I know it's often with good intention
I fear that the barriers created by having so much process limit the progress we can make
barriers_identified: barriers created by having so much process
solutions_proposed: Fund organizations and leaders while limiting government-enforced bureaucracy
